sentences.sContent: I wish you knew me before I was an insomniac because I used to be a really nice person.
sentences.sContent_eng: I wish you knew me before I was an insomniac because I used to be a really nice person.
sentences.sCn: 我希望在我成为失眠症者之前你就认识我，因为我曾经是个地地道道的好人。

sentences.sContent: If both of you are insomniac, sitting by yourselves in a lounge, that is the hour when secret concerns and hopes are shared, out of the staff's earshot.
sentences.sContent_eng: If both of you are insomniac, sitting by yourselves in a lounge, that is the hour when secret concerns and hopes are shared, out of the staff's earshot.
sentences.sCn: 如果你们两人都是失眠患者，你们独自坐在大厅里，那就是你们分享秘密的焦虑和希望的时刻，远离工作人员的耳目。
